title: How to receive negative constructive criticism better - Quora

response.answer_text: Understand that criticism isn't a damnation but an opportunity. You now have the knowledge of what you did wrong as well as what you DIDN'T! Use your desire to not repeat the same mistakes to drive you to fix those mistakes and do not look at them as defeat but simply some small knobs you need to turn to tweak your performance. This was not your one and only chance this was your first shot in the dark now you have a target, start dialing it in.
